artist: Artist: Hosoda Eishi; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
inscription:
waka by Komachi

Color of flowers had changed 
Before I wasn\'t aware of that
While I\'d been seeing the time
Passing by me and the world

Hana no iro wa 
Utsuri ni keri na
Itazura ni
Waga mi yo ni furu 
Nagame seshi ma ni
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Disguised as the Six Immortal Poets 略六花撰
title: "Prostitute as Komachi"
